historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 14-297, in subsec. (a), substituted "Chapter 13A of this title" for "§ 31-2502.18".

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section and transition provisions, see § 24 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-192, see notes following § 31-3901.

For Law 14-297, see notes following § 31-1371.01.

For Law 15-262, see notes following § 31-3901.

DC CODE § 31-3911

Current through December 11, 2012
